attributes.action: House Members of Parliament as Army personel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many civil service buildings which could be furnished as army accommodation and used to house M.Ps when in London.   No 'secondary' houses would then have to be paid for or lavishly furnished.   If it is good enough for the Forces (who do a worthwhile job, even though they are not so highly paid), it should be good enough for M.Ps who are, after all, only our representives,  though they often seem to forget this.
